pullRequest.title: [pjlink] enhanced logging (show byte array in addition to string)
pullRequest.bodyText: This improvement enables logging of responses from the device as byte arrays. This could help to resolve some remaining issues reported by the community as well as in #6725.

commit.message:
enhanced logging (show byte array in addition to string)

Signed-off-by: Nils Schnabel <github@to.nilsschnabel.de>

mention the type of status that could not be understood

Signed-off-by: Nils Schnabel <github@to.nilsschnabel.de>

nodes.bodyText:
It's always good to have more details!
The string operations are relatively expensive so it's better to make the logging conditional using logger.isDebugEnabled() . Another improvement is to always remove .toString() from all log message parameters because it will automatically be called by the logging framework but only when the logging is enabled.

commit.message:
performance considerations for logging

Signed-off-by: Nils Schnabel <github@to.nilsschnabel.de>
